p: PM 10 was observed to have an effect on organic-cause mortality and cardiorespiratory admissions, in both cases at lag 0, with an impact of 4.3% in the case of mortality and an impact of 8.3% in the case of admissions for every increase of 10 μg/m 3. No effect of heat was observed in the case of hospital admissions due to cardiorespiratory causes.
